B

beep6() - Method in class main.DriveManager
This method cause the robot to beep 6 times, it is used if the robot has to abandon flag search.
blockDetected() - Method in class util.BlockSearch
The search method calls this method whenever a block is detected by the ultrasonic sensor. This method cause the robot to turn toward the block, travel to it and check its color. If it is the target block the robot beeps 3 times, otherwise it beeps once. Next, the robot goes back to the perimeter and goes back to to where it was in the search method.
BlockSearch - Class in util
This class contains the two methods used to perform the block search routine.  One method traverses the perimeter of the search region searching for a, and the other method goes to a block once one is detected and determines if it is the target block or not.
BlockSearch() - Constructor for class util.BlockSearch
 
BR_LLx - Static variable in class main.DriveManager
 
BR_LLy - Static variable in class main.DriveManager
 
BR_URx - Static variable in class main.DriveManager
 
BR_URy - Static variable in class main.DriveManager
 
bridgeSeq() - Method in class util.CourseFollowing
Once lined up with the bridge, this method is called to drive over the bridge, the robot then contracts its track using the transform() method once it is over the bridge.
